items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: I'm 5'4. This dress fits so cute and its adorable. My husband really loved it on me. I wore it to my father n loves funeral and dressd it up with a junk tie I made. I have very sensitive skin and thus material qas very comfortable. Material is Not to thin or to thick. The waist line is very cute and sexy. Unfortunately, I didn't take pictures. Read more
items.author: Nachelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color is gorgeous and fabric feels lovely.
items.body: Fits like a glove,beautiful!! Read more
items.author: Summer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good product with some flaws
items.body: Perfect fit for 5'1" 140 lb figure. My only complaint is the fabric is a bit too thin. I removed the material from the inside of the neck because you could see it easily and I did purchase a "t-shirt" type of slip because every seam of my slip or bra would show through. That being said, I still think it is worth the money. The quality of the fabric (although thinner that I like) and the quality of the workmanship was great. Read more
items.author: Geeta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Flattering, and Versatile Dress
items.body: I bought this dress last minute for a funeral, and it turned out to be the perfect choice. The fit is very flattering, with an A-line shape that flows nicely without being too tight. It hits right at the knee, so it feels appropriate and modest, yet still stylish. The fabric is comfortable, and the pockets are a great bonus. Read more
items.author: Ky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size and flow of dress
items.body: This was the perfect dress. It was a little long for me but I am 4”11. Overall the dress worked good for me. Love the fact the the dress has pocket. Read more
items.author: Jordynn Thornton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress
items.body: Great fit! And got plenty of compliments…best part!?! It has pockets! Read more
items.author: LaTonya M

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice plain dress.
items.body: Nice length and fits true to size. Material is soft but thin. The dress looks very plain so you will need to add accessories like a belt, pendant or scarf for texture. Also, you’ll need to steam the dress as it gets wrinkled quickly. Read more
items.author: TA

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 03-black, Pine Green, 03-red, Army Green, Luminous Yellow, Black, Navy Blue, Orange, Light Blue, Red, Pink, White, Purple, Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
